lead_paragraph: Barcelona beat Real Madrid, 3-2, in the Cup, but the scintillating goals and pinpoint passes delivered by both soccer teams suggest the gap this year between the top two and the rest will be wider than ever.
snippet: Barcelona beat Real Madrid, 3-2, in the Cup, but the scintillating goals and pinpoint passes delivered by both soccer teams suggest the gap this year between the top two and the rest will be wider than ever.
